# Mestrado - Marcelo Bernardi

## Carregando Pacotes

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Carregando Dados

```{r}
data_set <- readr::read_rds("data/data-icm.rds")
data_set |>  glimpse()
```

## Boxplot

```{r}
data_set |> 
  ggplot(aes(y=as_factor(trat),x=icm_1,
             fill=as_factor(dose))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top"
  ) +
  labs(x = "ICM-1 (%)",
       y = "Tratamentos",
       fill="Doses")
```

```{r}
data_set |> 
  ggplot(aes(y=as_factor(trat),x=icm_2,
             fill=as_factor(dose))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top"
  ) +
  labs(x = "ICM-2 (%)",
       y = "Tratamentos",
       fill="Doses")
```
